node.title: Snoop Dogg steps up for the Golden Globes, but where are all the other stars?
node.alt: Snoop Dogg wearing a red beanie and black and white shirt and sunglasses at a lectern
node.description: The only star to take to the stage for the 2022 Golden Globes nominations was rapper Snoop Dogg. Other stars have been eerily quiet.
node.content:
["When rapper Snoop Dogg took to the stage to announce the nominees of the 2022 Golden Globe Awards, he was the only star to do so.", "The entertainer rocked up in a red beanie with the words Murder Was the Case displayed, a reference to his 1993 murder trial and hit single \u2013 a story that fellow rapper and executive producer\u00a050 Cent\u00a0plans to develop into a TV series.", "", "
Snoop Dogg adds his distinct flair and pronunciations to the 2022 Golden Globes nominations
", "The talk of the town was Snoop's mispronunciation of nominees' names, with the chatter on Twitter mainly poking fun at that.", "From the stars who were nominated \u2013 crickets.", "Film and TV stars are usually excited about being nominated for a Golden Globe\u00a0and, in years prior, actors like Unbelievable's Kaitlyn Dever have expressed that excitement on the publicity circuit.", "But this year, nominated stars like Lady Gaga, Will Smith, Ben Affleck, Nicole Kidman, Sarah Snook, Anthony Anderson, Tracee Ellis Ross, Leonardo DiCaprio, and Denzel Washington are yet to comment on social media or in interviews.", "The muted reaction speaks volumes. Have you seen that meme? \"No response is a response, and it's a powerful one.\"", "The nominees' announcement was streamed on Youtube, after NBC \u2013 the longtime telecaster of the Globes \u2013 said it would not air the 2022 ceremony.", "The organisation behind the awards \u2013 the Hollywood Foreign Press Association (HFPA) \u2013 has faced a bitter backlash after the Los Angeles Times exposed unethical behaviour and revealed that its 87 voting members didn't include a single black journalist.", "Studios said they would boycott the Golden Globes and more than 100 firms representing actors said their clients wouldn't participate in the awards until the HFPA swiftly implemented \"profound and lasting change.\"", "Actor Tom Cruise even returned his three Golden Globes to the group's headquarters.", "The HFPA claims it has remade itself.", "", "
Rapper Snoop Dogg poses next to the Golden Globe statue at the 79th Annual Golden Globe Awards nominations announcement in Beverly Hills, California, U.S., December 13, 2021. REUTERS/Mario Anzuoni(REUTERS/Mario Anzuoni)
", "Prior to introducing Snoop Dogg to the stage, HFPA President Helen Hoehne, said it had been a time of change and reflection for the Hollywood Foreign Press Association.", "\"For eight months we've worked tirelessly as an organisation to be better,\" Ms Hoehne said.", "\"We've changed our rules, bylaws, added a new code of conduct and restructured our governance.", "", "
Helen Hoehne president of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association, announces nominations for the 79th annual Golden Globe Awards at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Monday, Dec. 13, 2021, in Beverly Hills, Calif. The 79th annual Golden Globe Awards will be held on Sunday, Jan. 9, 2022. (AP Photo/Chris Pizzello)(AP Photo/Chris Pizzello)
", "\"We also have 21 new members, the largest and most diverse in our 79-year-old history.", "Ms\u00a0Hoehne sounded visibly nervous.", "The 21 new members include six black journalists, while a chief diversity officer has been added, and America's National Association for the Advancement of Coloured People (NAACP) has been brought in on a five-year partnership.", "But it all could be too little, too late if the deafening silence is anything to go by."]
